It starts in 2012. We have to work hard to successfully complete the year 2012.
All our work is done on a systematic basis. First of all, the right strategic directions are defined.
There are specific enforcement mechanisms for achieving these strategic goals: financial resources, enforcement mechanisms and, of course, professionalism.
My assignment to all government members and government agencies is that (cont) http://t.co/qtN5Fyz9
Transparency should be fully ensured and the transparency of investments made by the state should be fully ensured.
Implementation of major infrastructure projects will continue in 2012. #Azerbaijan
Irrigation projects are also of great importance. This plays an important role in the development of agriculture and the elimination of unemployment.
Gasification projects will be implemented in 2012. The task has been set (cont) http://t.co/ob1SSIRh
Electricity projects are of particular importance among investment projects. #Azerbaijan
We expect this year to be commissioned by the major power plant - the South Electric Power Station. #Azerbaijan
This year, we will launch the first Azerbaijani telecommunication satellite into orbit. This will be a historic event. Azerbaijan creates space industry.
Azerbaijan should bring all progressive and advanced technologies. We bring, apply and train staff. #Azerbaijan
We have free internet. I can say that no free internet is available in every country. #Azerbaijan
The number of Internet users is growing, and I value it as a very positive one. (cont) http://t.co/dlmVWv7X
There is a democratic society in Azerbaijan and we need to further strengthen democratic foundations. #Azerbaijan
New Technology Park in Balakhani, Chemical Park in Sumgayit will be created and jobs will be opened. #Azerbaijan
We must further strengthen food security measures in 2012. #Azerbaijan
The work done in this field is positive. This year, we have managed to achieve considerable growth in agriculture. Plants growing, productivity increases.
Now, our local products are no worse than foreign products - both quality and their contemporary (cont) http://t.co/DMLzbEOf
We need foreign markets. We need to go even further to traditional markets and new markets. #Azerbaijan
Azerbaijan is currently producing some of the finest products in the agricultural processing industry in Europe (cont) http://t.co/D4FtBhWz
At the end of last year, the State Program on the development of viniculture was adopted. #Azerbaijan
Key issues related to the storage of products have been resolved. Insufficient refrigerator reservoirs have been built. #Azerbaijan
The Baku and Baku settlements development program has been adopted. There was a great need for this program. (cont) http://t.co/1HjHe8uR
As regards army building, I would like to note that in 2012 both material and technical equipment (cont) http://t.co/dioEE7EL
I have put the task that all the military units have a high level of repair (cont) http://t.co/Wux1YluD
Servicemen should serve in good conditions. Both their living and working conditions should be good. #Azerbaijan
In all military units, including military units, primarily on the contact line (cont) http://t.co/bkfWUiM
Concrete measures are being taken to improve the social conditions of the military. Twenty years (cont) http://t.co/hmgJ3eYo
Much work is being done to improve the living standards of internally displaced persons. #Azerbaijan
Industrialization works are underway, technoparks are functioning. Sumgait Technology Park is expanding its activities. #Azerbaijan
A new aluminum plant will be launched in Ganja. This is a great event. It is a great step for the development of the aluminum industry. #Azerbaijan
The fight against corruption and bribery should be continued with full seriousness. #Azerbaijan
A great deal has been done in this area in 2011. Greater works in 2012 (cont) http://t.co/jdqshLJK
There is world practice, there is a positive experience, the European Union has experience. We must always take good practice. #Azerbaijan
Summer Olympic Games will be held in 2012. #Azerbaijan
We have won victories in the world and European championships, that is, our hopes are great. #Azerbaijan
In 2012, our ten Olympic complexes will be built. The construction of the Great Olympic Stadium will now be an active phase. #Azerbaijan
There are many things to do in 2012. I'm looking forward to activity, selflessness, conscience and victory. #Azerbaijan

Today we present another project Bicentennial Legacy: the remodeling of the Civic District of Santiago, historical scene of the republican life
"Legacy Bicentennial" seeks to recover for Chileans public spaces that are part of our identity, but that were abandoned.
Other "Bicentennial Legacy" are the construction of the Citizenship Park, around the National Stadium and the rescue of the Pereira Palace
